ðŸ“– Summary: Cavasik is an audio visualizer based on CAVA, offering extended capabilities and a customizable interface. It provides various drawing modes, color options, and configuration settings to create dynamic visual representations of audio. Users can control the visualizer through a graphical interface or a DBus interface, and even load color schemes from files.
